short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search for bookmarks and tabs in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows to quickly search through your bookmarks and tabs and navigate to selected one

How to search:
t:text will search in tabs
b:text will search in bookmarks
text without prefix will search in both tabs and bookmarks

Shortcuts (chrome://extensions/shortcuts):
Ctrl+M - Windows
Cmd+E - Mac

Code is opensource:
https://github.com/mateuszmigas/searchlight
